channel.title: I get this error when running a 508/503 client help me please!
channel.description:
This happens in only 503/508 clients i run,please help me!
Ok Thanks i got that fixed but now it does this...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Met hod) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java: 188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.ja va:276) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.ja va:319) Press any key to continue . . .
@echo off cd files java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 pause
Should i change that? PLEASE HELP I'LL GIVE ANYTHING!!

item.title: I get this error when running a 508/503 client help me please!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“r34p4g3pk, post:1, topic:236415”]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI[/quote]
As far as i’m concerned the 508 clients don’t have a EGUI class.

Read full topic
